answers.answer: BACK IN 2004, I WOUND UP IN THE EMERGENCY ROOM WITH WALKING PNEUMONIA.  I WAS ALSO SUFFERING FROM POLYCYTHEMIA. I WAS 50 LBS OVERWEIGHT AND IN SEVERE BACK PAIN. I WAS TOLD THAT I WAS A TYPE -2 DIABETIC.  IS THERE A CONNECTION BETWEEN POLYCYTHEMIA AND TYPE 2-DIABETES?  CAN THE SYMPTOMS OF POLYCYTHEMIA BE MISTAKEN FOR TYPE 2- DIABETES?

question: THIS IS MY FIRST POST SO HERE GOES. IN 2003 MY FATHER DIED OF AML. HE WAS DIAGNOSED DEC.24,2002 AND DIED JAN.17, 2003.  IT WAS A VERY SUDDEN DEATH THAT EVEN CAUGHT MY COUSIN (THE DOCTOR) OFF GUARD. NOW I HAVE BEEN DIAGNOSED WITH POLYCYTHEMIA. COULD MY FATHER HAVE HAD THIS BLOOD DISORDER  NO ONE CAUGHT?  IS THIS GOING TO MEAN I HAVE AML???
title: IS THERE A CONECTION BETWEEN POLYCYTHEMIA AND AML? HEREDITARY? GENETIC?
